name: Vurvacious Milk & Honey
description:
This is the flavor of choice for the divine and glorious Vurve, creamy and oh so sweet! It is that amazing FLV Milk & Honey with a dash of TFA VBIC to give a pretty amazing combo! You just cant get enough in your mouth... It's good as a S&V but better with steeping!

Inspiration from The Vurve himself 

***If you mix this, please leave a review and let me know what you think or if you think there is something that could be changed to make it better!***
author: KillaCoDe

reviews.text: Don't let the percentage fool ya.  I mixed about 20 recipes in big bottles when i first started diying.  Foolish yes.  But it allowed me to have a nicely aged dark and powerful milk and honey. Not the milk and honey they talk about in the bible.  No sir.   The kind of milk n honey that stays out late doing things you just can't bring your self to question because you are truly afraid of the answer youll hear.  Let it age a few months and you'll have to rename it the Anti Milk n Honey.  Good stuff..
I'm Vurve and I approve this message.
Nice, simple, and sweet. I enjoyed this and just a good, refreshing and creamy vape.
